timeline.title: Full Stack Developer
timeline.description: A 32-week, fast-paced remote bootcamp, focusing on JavaScript (ES6), TypeScript, React, HTML5, CSS, and server-side programming with Node.js, with weekly projects covering everything from the basics of programming to structuring web projects using the latest technology. We work with Agile methodology through weekly sprint planning, check-ins, demos, and reflections. Mob-programming and pair-programming make up a significant part of the course.

timeline.title: Yrkeshögskoleexamen
timeline.description: A 32-week, fast-paced remote bootcamp, focusing on JavaScript (ES6), TypeScript, React, HTML5, CSS, and server-side programming with Node.js, with weekly projects covering everything from the basics of programming to structuring web projects using the latest technology. We worked with Agile methodology through weekly sprint planning, check-ins, demos, and reflections. Mob-programming and pair-programming made up a significant part of the course. Highlights: JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Node.js, HTML, CSS

timeline.title: Product Marketing Specialist
timeline.description: Product Marketing Specialist at Refined.

timeline.title: Communications Manager
timeline.description: Primary Responsibilities: - Managing the content calendar and ensuring consistent publication of blog articles - Holding overall SEO accountability, including technical SEO and performance, with regular reporting to the CMO - Overseeing PPC campaigns on Meta, Bing, and Google Ads, primarily focusing on copywriting but also including keyword analysis, budget management, and strategy aligned with KPIs - Leading a team of 3-4 law students - Crafting and implementing email campaigns directly targeted at customers - Identifying and executing affiliate partnerships with relevant influencers and podcasts

timeline.title: Communication Professional
timeline.description: Broadly speaking, I worked with communications at Polynom. I was responsible for the contact with our investors, as well as the strategy to acquire new ones. Apart from that, I had some IT-related responsibilities, as well as some light database management. I started out as a consultant in 2020, going full time by February 2022. Some of the things I did and/or was responsible for included: - Co-manage our yearly event "Polynomdagen" with 220 participants - Write monthly and bi-weekly newsletters to our part owners - Setup and management of our databases - E-signatures and digitised processes for contracts - Automated onboarding funnels for investors - Starting an internal podcast for our investors - Starting a council for our investors to make their voices heard - Strategy for finding new investors - Purchasing of IT-hardware and software

timeline.title: Founder
timeline.description: As a freelancing generalist, I make use of the ability to learn and adapt to new situations. I pick up things that I need to learn, for my customers. Some of the things that me and my team have been doing in the past years include: - Set up a self-hosted Discourse forum - Numerous websites designed and set up - Various IT-related tasks like hosting solutions and e-mail server management - Podcast Editing for one of the biggest podcasts in Personal Finances in Sweden - Built and managed databases in Airtable for a variety of use cases - Developed the social media channels for RikaTillsammans.se - Helped 4 clients start and distribute their own podcasts - Coaching individuals and teams - Found the best Ice Cream spots in Malmö through thorough research - Advised on, bought and assembled an office tech solution for a small company And many more things. The most important thing for me and my team is to keep our calm, and try to solve the problems that arise for our clients.

timeline.title: Project Manager
timeline.description: In this role, I was co-creating the project #FUEL1Million where Project FUEL is going to collect a total of 1 million life lessons in 2020. We collected these life lessons to create educational material for all kinds of learners.

timeline.title: Executive Assistant
timeline.description: På RikaTillsammans hjälper jag till med lite allt möjligt. Det är allt ifrån att sköta vissa Sociala Medie-kanaler till att bygga soffor till kontoret. Huvudsakligen jobbar jag med podcasten och att skapa innehåll kring den.

timeline.title: Ungdomscoach
timeline.description: Jobbar med att stödja en tonårskille med stöd i handlingsplan från SOC. Bland annat handlar det om fritidssysselsättning, mentalt stöd och stöd för utbildning.

timeline.title: Raoul Wallenberg Academy Leadership Camp
timeline.description: Intensive leadership development program focused on ethical leadership and social responsibility.
achievements: Built network of socially conscious leaders

timeline.title: Co-Creator
timeline.description: Co-Creator at Emprogage AB.

timeline.title: Ansvarig utgivare
timeline.description: Redaktionen är en plattform för unga att uttrycka sig på och sprida sitt innehåll på. Vi jobbar med de kanaler som är relevanta för unga idag. Jag är initiativtagare och skribent, bland annat. https://www.facebook.com/atredaktionen/

timeline.title: Host
timeline.description: "Ett samtal" or in English, "A conversation", is a podcast that I've started and that I host. I have a couple of reasons to have the project running. I wanted to learn the podcast medium and see what the process of creating a podcast is like. It's also an excuse for me to have thoughtful conversations with people I look up to on topics I want to talk to them about. And most importantly, I think the conversations can create value for individuals listening. The whole show is in Swedish.

timeline.title: Internship on project management
timeline.description: I was involved on a management level in a couple of different projects in and around the organisation. One of them was the Visual Viking Academy, a training in visual thinking and graphical recording.

timeline.title: Assistant Content Manager
timeline.description: I'm a part of the team in Lund. My main focus is to develop our digital presence by creating content valuable to the people following us. http://worldvaluesinitiative.se/

timeline.title: Micro Expressions Training Tool
timeline.description: Specialized training in micro expressions recognition and analysis for improved communication and understanding.
achievements: Applied skills in professional and personal contexts

timeline.title: Subtle Expressions, Expert Level
timeline.description: Advanced certification in subtle expressions analysis, building on micro expressions foundation with expert-level skills.
achievements: Achieved expert level in subtle expressions analysis

timeline.title: Host
timeline.description: Lärdom för dagen, roughly translated to "Learning of today" is a vlog series that I've been shooting almost every weekday since mid November. On it, I talk for about 5 minutes about something that I've learned the last couple of days. You can find it on Facebook at #lärdomfördagen or on Youtube.

timeline.title: Bachelor's degree
timeline.description: Bachelor's degree studies at Lund University.
details: The program's association as master of finances.

timeline.title: Project manager
timeline.description: I organised a side event for a theatre show called "Den e Vi" that was shown at Malmö City Theatre. I booked a live band, produced a short documentary about the city and made some decorations for the room.

timeline.title: Assistant Project Manager
timeline.description: I had responsibilities regarding finding potential collaborations, send applications for funds all in the start up of a project called "Hemmaplan". The whole concept was to get young kids to exercise more, with the basketball as a tool.

timeline.title: Project Management I
timeline.description: A basic course in project management.

timeline.title: Administrator
timeline.company: What do you need help with today buddy?
timeline.description: ”What do you need help with today buddy?” Is a Facebook group with over 40.000 members. The mission is to create a kinder and helping forum online. https://www.facebook.com/groups/whatdoyouneedhelpwithtodaybuddy/

timeline.title: Project Manager
timeline.description: Samtalsaktivisterna, or "The Conversational Activists" started out as a Reach For Change-funded project. I played a key role in going from just a project to creating an NGO and building the organisation from the ground up. I was hired as a project manager and admin, but quickly was responsible for personel, sales, planning as well as administration and managing projects. http://samtalsaktivisterna.se

timeline.title: Styrelseledamot
timeline.description: Styrelseledamot at Sveriges Elevkårer.

timeline.title: CFO and co-founder
timeline.description: A friend and I, when doing our last year at Bladins Gymnasium, started a company through Ung Företagsamhet as a school work. We sold howerboards/2-wheel segways. We had a turnover of almost 100.000SEK in our first 5 months.

timeline.title: Gymnasium
timeline.description: The whole program and all the material was in English.
details: board member of the united student unions of Malmö
Initiator and responsible for the Soccer team and the Chess club. I received the honorary "Bladiner of the year" my last year for the contributions I made.
